title: Betting and gaming : United Kingdom HMRC tax receipts 2000 to 2019
yAxis: Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP
summary: In general Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP has rose over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014/15 and 2015/16.
The highest Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, of value 2.86 was reached at Year 2017/18
The lowest Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP, of value 1.29 was reported at Year 2002/03
min_summary: Overall Betting and gaming tax receipts in billion GBP has increased over the Year.
